title: The Heartstone
description: Ariana receives a magical crystal that catapults her to Ledrith a magical celtic world where the Heartstone originated. In order to get home she has to return the Heartstone to the Web of Stars without being captured by the tyrant Rhysin. In the process of her journey she is helped by the Lord Jarod and the mage Cerynus who teaches her how to use the magic of the Stone. After many adventures she reaches the Web of Stars. If she puts it back she goes home and now she's not so sure of what she wants.
author: Lisa Finnegan
